code: import'./Hero.css';import Carousel from'react-material-ui-carousel';import{Paper}from'@mui/material';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faCirclePlay}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{Link,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Hero=function Hero(_ref){var movies=_ref.movies;var navigate=useNavigate();function reviews(movieId){navigate("/Reviews/".concat(movieId));}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-carousel-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel,{children:movies===null||movies===void 0?void 0:movies.map(function(movie){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Paper,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-card-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-card",style:{"--img":"url(".concat(movie.backdrops[0],")")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-poster",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:movie.poster,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:movie.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-buttons-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/Trailer/".concat(movie.trailerLink.substring(movie.trailerLink.length-11)),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"play-button-icon-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"play-button-icon",icon:faCirclePlay})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-review-button-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"info",onClick:function onClick(){return reviews(movie.imdbId);},children:"Reviews"})})]})]})})})},movie.imdbId);})})});};export default Hero;
